name: Unión Española Fotovoltaica
membership: UNEF is memeber of SolarPower Europe, the European Photovoltaic Industry Association, Global Solar Council, Energy Charter and International Energy Agency.
goal: UNEF is the leading and most representative photovoltaic association in Spain. We represent the whole PV value chain with almost 400 members (R&D, industrial companies, consultancies).
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: ETS, renewables, electricity market design, energy efficiency, self consumption, distributed generation smart cities
